metadata.name: File Download Using Notepad++ GUP Utility
metadata.comment: Detects execution of the Notepad++ updater (gup) from a process other than Notepad++ to download files.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\gup.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('gup.exe') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -unzipto ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('http')) AND NOT endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\\\notepad++.exe')))

output.summary: Detects execution of the Notepad++ updater (gup) from a process other than Notepad++ to download files.

metadata.objective: False positive: Other parent processes other than notepad++ using GUP that are not currently identified Reference: https://twitter.com/nas_bench/status/1535322182863179776
